backend_llm_notes: Locally hosted Ollama model - gpt-oss:20b (13 GB, based on GPT architecture)
original_prompt: Keep my Calendar up to date by committing to only meetings that are part of my priorities.

gutts.name: Priority Extraction
gutts.capability: Retrieve and interpret the user's current priorities from relevant sources (e.g., notes, task lists, or calendar metadata).
gutts.user_goal: Ensure the system knows what matters most to the user so decisions can be aligned with priorities.

gutts.name: Meeting Evaluation
gutts.capability: Assess incoming or scheduled meeting requests against the extracted priorities to determine relevance.
gutts.user_goal: Filter out meetings that do not contribute to the user's priority objectives.

gutts.name: Calendar Commitment & Update
gutts.capability: Commit to relevant meetings and update the calendar accordingly, while declining or postponing non-priority meetings.
gutts.user_goal: Maintain an up-to-date calendar that reflects only priority-aligned meetings.

notes: Generated by Ollama gpt-oss:20b - Locally hosted LLM on macOS
